properties.name: secret_key
properties.description: Interswitch API requires a secret key to sign requests. Please paste your secret key here.

properties.name: client_id
properties.description: Interswitch API requires a client id to sign requests. Please paste your client id here.

properties.name: country_code
properties.description: ISO 4217 standard currency code, always NG

properties.name: currency_code
properties.description: ISO 4217 standard currency code, currency code for Naira is 566

properties.name: currency_code_str
properties.description: ISO 4217 standard string currency code, currency code for Naira is 'NGN'

properties.name: initiation_payment_method_code
properties.description: Payment Method Code of where transfer is being initiated from. InitiationPaymentMethodCode must always be CA.

properties.name: initiation_channel
properties.description: See Payment channel in Appendix.Channel must always be 7.

properties.name: terminating_payment_method_code
properties.description: One of the payment method codes for where the transfer is to be terminated.TerminatingPaymentMethodCode must always be AC.

properties.name: terminating_account_type
properties.description: For bank accounts only.10 = Savings account; 20 = Current Account; 00 = default value / not sure

properties.name: withdraw_api_url
properties.description: The withdraw API URL.

properties.name: web_deposit_api_url
properties.description: The Web deposit widget API URL.

properties.name: withdraw_transaction_api_url
properties.description: The deposit transaction API URL.

properties.name: deposit_transaction_api_url
properties.description: The deposit transaction API URL.

properties.name: deposit_widget_url
properties.description: The deposit widget URL.

properties.name: pay_item_id
properties.description: Pay item ID from Interswitch developer tools page

properties.name: signature_method
properties.description: Signature Method

properties.name: header_signature_method
properties.description: Signature Method

properties.name: initiating_entity_code
properties.description: Client Entity Code issued by Interswitch

properties.name: time_zone
properties.description: Time zone

properties.name: hash_charset
properties.description: Hash (SHA-512) charset

properties.name: bank_list_url
properties.description: Banks list URL.

properties.name: dummy_email
properties.description: Dummy email for NG players

properties.name: product_id
properties.description: Product ID

properties.name: mac_key
properties.description: Mac Key

properties.name: retryBeforeExpireProperty
properties.description: Retry Processing before Expiring Transaction

properties.name: ip_whitelist
properties.description: White list for PAYDirect requests. Addreses delimiter is ','

properties.name: merchant_reference
properties.description: Unique ID given by Interswitch to the client using the bill payment solution

properties.name: product_name
properties.description: This is the name of the item that customer should/can pay for

properties.name: name_enquiry_url
properties.description: Name Enquiry URL.

properties.name: initialValidation
properties.description: Set true to enable account number validation before do withdraw

properties.name: request_reference_prefix
properties.description: Request Reference Prefix. Should be with length 5

properties.name: bank_account_lookup_bank_account_flag
properties.description: Bank Account Lookup. Set true to append Bank Account field to Bank Account Lookup

properties.name: bank_account_lookup_bank_code_flag
properties.description: Bank Account Lookup. Set true to append Bank Code field to Bank Account Lookup

properties.name: bank_account_lookup_bank_name_flag
properties.description: Bank Account Lookup. Set true to append Bank Name field to Bank Account Lookup
